snippet: Joseph Hall, 12, knew right from wrong when he shot his sleeping father to death in 2011, a judge said in finding him responsible of second-degree murder.
abstract: California Judge Jean P Leonard finds Joseph Hall responsible for second-degree murder, saying the now 12-year-old boy knew right from wrong when he shot and killed his neo-Nazi father in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Hall, 12, knew right from wrong when he shot his sleeping father to death in 2011, a judge said in finding him responsible of second-degree murder.

headline.seo: Joseph Hall, 12, Found Responsible in Killing of Neo-Nazi Father
headline.main: Judge Finds California Boy Responsible in the Killing of His Neo-Nazi Father
headline.print_headline: Judge Finds California Boy Responsible in the Killing of His Neo-Nazi Father
